name: @syncnapse/root
description: SyncNapse monorepo (frontend: Next.js, backend: Nest.js, infra helpers)

scripts.build: npm -w backend run build && npm -w frontend run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c blue,green "npm -w frontend run dev" "npm -w backend run start:dev"
scripts.lint: npm -w frontend run lint && npm -w backend run lint
scripts.format: npm -w frontend run format && npm -w backend run format
scripts.test: npm -w frontend run test && npm -w backend run test
scripts.test:ci: npm -w frontend run test:ci && npm -w backend run test:ci
